name: Out Of Time (itch) (DChapmanTSU)
description:
A game made for the 2021 Riverside Game Jam.

You play as a small cube creature named 'Gary'.

Your goal is to keep 'Gary' alive for as long as possible by collecting 'Time Components' littered throughout the level.

The level is randomized based on a small pool of level segment templates that spawn and despawn as you progress, making every run unique!

Controls:

A and S to walk

W to jump

Space to airdash

If you find any game breaking bugs feel free to leave them in the comments and I'll attempt to fix them.

Sounds sampled and created in LeshySFMaker: https://www.leshylabs.com/apps/sfMaker

This game was a solo project made in Unity by me: Daniel Chapman
